markdown:
| icon           = poe2 rolled_letter icon.png
| description    = [Player Name] - or should I simply call you thief?

It should come as no surprise that we have much to discuss.

You are invited to an audience at my manor in Periki's Overlook. I believe you know the way. This time you will find the door unlocked.

Against my wishes I am compelled to guarantee your safety, so try not to worry yourself into an early grave - at least not before our 'business' is concluded.

Regards, ~ Arkemyr
